# discoveredAccessories

**Instance Property**

An array of accessories discovered during a search.

## Declaration

```swift
var discoveredAccessories: [HMAccessory] { get }
```

## Discussion

When you start a new search by calling the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessoryBrowser/startSearchingForNewAccessories()] method, HomeKit clears the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessoryBrowser/discoveredAccessories] array. It then modifies the array as it discovers new accessories until you end the search by calling the [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMAccessoryBrowser/stopSearchingForNewAccessories()] method.

## Discovering accessories

- **startSearchingForNewAccessories()**: Starts searching for accessories not yet associated with a home.
- **stopSearchingForNewAccessories()**: Stops searching for new accessories.

items.description: Starts searching for accessories not yet associated with a home.
items.name: startSearchingForNewAccessories()
